item.title: OpenAI
item.description: OpenAI’s article on evolution strategies algorithm as a scalable alternative to reinforcement learning. For unsupervised learning, the gradients can be computed with finite differences instead of backpropagation. Apparently, using this algorithm in tensorflow which works with denormal numbers off, nonlinearity arises from deep linear networks.

item.title: Self-driving cars
item.description: Machine learning for self-driving Euro Truck Simulator 2 https://github.com/marshq/europilot. I played ETS2 about 10 years ago and dammit, this drives better.

item.title: Smoothing for the CGAL during Google summer of Code 2017
item.description: This is a final report on my work for the CGAL project during the 2017 Google summer of code. My main task was to enhance the Polygon mesh processing package with two algorithms for optimization of a triangulated 3D surface mesh. The first algorithm aims at improving the mesh quality by using geometric criteria such as angles adjacent to mesh vertices and element areas, as proposed in this paper by Surazhsky and Gotsman.

item.title: Prime numbers
item.description: This is my sieve of Eratosthenes. How fast is it?
